en-US.name: Codex
en-US.summary: Voice gateway to your Codex automation agent.
en-US.description: Codex lets you speak tasks to your autonomous automation agent. Issue instructions, ask for status updates, and receive completion notifications without leaving Alexa.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Codex to refresh the portfolio site
Alexa, tell Codex to run the nightly report
Alexa, ask Codex for the latest status

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This skill forwards voice tasks to the Codex automation agent hosted on branch.bet. Use the RunTaskIntent for execution and GetStatusIntent to retrieve the latest summary.
